name: Horror Among Midnight Sleep
description:
The devil has been killing everyone here and is getting more powerful.
Devil hungers for human blood and you are the next victim. You have to escape this Horror and scary old building by finding keys to open the main gate .

In order to find it you have to complete different tasks.
Look in the house to find tasks to get out of the house.
You must kill him tonight and destroy his machine before it is too late.
Enjoy and Experience the most terrifying Game ever.
